name: Flower
description: Flower is a web tool for monitoring Celery.

FLOWER_EMAIL_DOMAIN.description: Enables Google OAuth. You need to create OAuth credentials and also enable the Google+ API, otherwise it will return 403. You need to your domain to a regex like: .*@example\.com$

FLOWER_OAUTH2_KEY.description: Oauth2 key. Required if using OAuth.

FLOWER_OAUTH2_SECRET.description: OAuth2 secret. Required if using OAuth.

FLOWER_OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI.description: OAuth2 redirect uri. Required if using OAuth. Should look like: https://my-app.herokuapp.com/login
